Info Source: Contained in data obtained on May 23, 2018 in response to a Freedom of Information Act request.

Description: Adesa Inc. agreed to pay $225,000 in settlement of alleged environmental violations involving destroying wetlands to create storage space for its vehicles.

Agency: Massachusetts Executive Office of Energy and Environmental Affairs
Notes: Captured from records in EEA database with basic enforcement information; may not include full details of penalties.

NAICS Translation: 423110: Automobile and Other Motor Vehicle Merchant Wholesalers
